title: Add AI release skills and integration test suite
body:
## Summary

This PR introduces a comprehensive AI-assisted release workflow and integration testing infrastructure for SkiaSharp.

## New AI Skills

Three new skills to guide AI through the complete release process:

### 1. `release-branch` — Create Release Branches
- Auto-detects next preview version from main branch
- Supports all release types: preview, stable, hotfix preview, hotfix stable
- Updates `PREVIEW_LABEL` in azure-templates-variables.yml
- Bumps main version after preview releases

### 2. `release-testing` — Verify Packages Before Publishing
- Resolves package versions automatically from preview feed
- Runs integration tests across multiple platforms:
  - Console (.NET runtime)
  - Blazor (Chromium)
  - MAUI iOS (oldest + newest simulators)
  - MAUI Android (API 21-23 + API 35-36)
  - MAUI Mac Catalyst
- Includes detailed setup, monitoring, and troubleshooting references
- Strict pass/fail criteria — no rationalizing failures

### 3. `release-publish` — Publish and Finalize Releases
- Step-by-step Azure DevOps pipeline instructions
- NuGet.org verification with polling
- Git tag creation with confirmation prompts
- GitHub release creation with auto-generated notes
- Release notes annotation with platform/contributor emojis
- Milestone closing for stable releases
- Error recovery guidance for common issues

## Integration Test Suite

New `tests/SkiaSharp.Tests.Integration/` project for pre-release verification:

| Test | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `SmokeTests` | Quick sanity check |
| `ConsoleTests` | Core API functionality |
| `BlazorTests` | WebAssembly rendering |
| `MauiiOSTests` | iOS simulator rendering |
| `MauiAndroidTests` | Android emulator rendering |
| `MauiMacCatalystTests` | Mac Catalyst rendering |
| `MauiWindowsTests` | Windows rendering |

Features:
- Screenshot comparison against reference images
- Appium-based UI automation for mobile/desktop
- Parameterized device/version testing
- Clear failure diagnostics

## Documentation Updates

- **releasing.md** — Expanded with workflow diagrams, version patterns, and skill references
- **copilot-instructions.md** — Updated with skill descriptions

## Files Changed

- `.github/skills/release-branch/` — Branch creation skill
- `.github/skills/release-testing/` — Testing skill + 3 reference docs
- `.github/skills/release-publish/` — Publishing skill + release notes reference
- `documentation/releasing.md` — Release workflow documentation
- `tests/SkiaSharp.Tests.Integration/` — New integration test project
